title: Finally got my Touch of Malice to level 320!
body:
http://41.media.tumblr.com/37629b41e825f3f066fb8d86b57ac0e8/tumblr_mwk92bs7821reyjnco9_500.jpg

Now I can one-shot everything in the game! Also, you'd be surprised how good it is in PVP. During the last Iron Banner I decided to trolll and switched everything in my inventory down to the lowest level item i had at the time, except for my ToM. Took me to level 233, but even then I was winning duels against level 300+ players. ToM is literally SO OP when you take advantage of its exotic perk. The only issue is you have to watch your surroundings to make sure you don't get outnumbered, because unless you have three enemies all lined up in a neat row for you, you aren't getting out alive.
